ValidationRule.description: It checks if the phone number entered for Offline Contact is valid
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( IF( NOT(ISBLANK( NS_OfflineContactWorkPhone__c ) ), NOT(REGEX(NS_OfflineContactWorkPhone__c ,"(\\d){7}|(\\d){10}")), FALSE ), IF( NOT(ISBLANK( NS_OfflineContactMobile__c ) ), NOT(REGEX(NS_OfflineContactMobile__c ,"(\\d){7}|(\\d){10}")), FALSE ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure that Contact Work Phone (and Contact Mobile if entered) are 7 digits or 10 digits with no dashes - or parenthesis ()
